ph_input_content: Please enter content, type "/" to insert variables
desc_receiver_openid: Unique identifier for ordinary users, unique to the current official account
desc_miniprogram_appid: The mini program appid must be associated with the official account sending the template message
msg_validation_thing: Up to 20 characters, can be a combination of Chinese characters, numbers, letters, or symbols
msg_validation_short_thing: Up to 5 characters, can be a combination of Chinese characters, numbers, letters, or symbols
msg_validation_number: Up to 32 digits, numbers only, can include decimal
msg_validation_const: Up to 20 characters, cannot be sent if exceeded
msg_validation_character_string: Up to 32 digits, letters, or symbols, can be a combination of numbers, letters, or symbols
msg_validation_time: 24-hour time format (supports year/month/day), supports time range, two time points connected by "~" symbol, e.g., October 1, 2019 15:01~October 1, 2019 18:01
msg_validation_date: Year/Month/Day format (supports 24-hour time), supports time range, two time points connected by "~" symbol, e.g., October 1, 2019 15:01~October 1, 2019 18:01
msg_validation_amount: Amount, 1 currency symbol + up to 10 pure numbers, can include decimal, can end with "元", e.g., ¥200元, $200
msg_validation_phone_number: Phone number, up to 17 digits, numbers and symbols
msg_validation_car_number: License plate, up to 8 digits, first and last characters can be Chinese characters, others are letters or numbers
msg_validation_name: Up to 10 pure Chinese characters or up to 20 pure letters or symbols
msg_validation_phrase: Chinese characters, up to 5 Chinese characters
msg_please_select_official_account: Please select an official account first
